game.title: The Lost Artifacts
game.objective: Find and return the stolen artifacts from the royal palace
game.description: Your mission, should you choose to accept, is to locate and retrieve the artifacts that were taken by an unknown thief. The king has offered 5000 gold coins as a reward.

task.objective: Locate the stolen map at the tavern
task.description: The old man Jenkins might have information on its whereabouts. Follow his lead.

task.objective: Uncover the artifacts' location using the map
task.description: You'll need to navigate through a heavily guarded area to find them. Stay cautious!

task.objective: Return the artifacts to King Harold at the palace
task.description: Once you have them, hand them back to claim your reward.
